birth_place.zh-cn: 大明浙江绍兴府余姚县
birth_place.en: Yuyao County, Shaoxing Prefecture, Zhejiang, Ming Dynasty

description.zh-cn: 明代著名的思想家、哲学家、书法家、文学家、政治家及军事家，陆王心学的集大成者，精通儒、释、道三教。他官至南京兵部尚书，因平定宸濠之乱等军功封为新建伯，后追赠新建侯，谥号“文成”。其学说“阳明学”对中国及东亚有深远影响。
description.en: A renowned thinker, philosopher, calligrapher, writer, politician, and military strategist of the Ming Dynasty. He was the most important figure in the School of Mind (Xin-xue) after Lu Jiuyuan. He served as the Minister of War in Nanjing and was ennobled as Earl of Xinjian for his military merits, such as suppressing the Prince of Ning rebellion. His philosophy, known as 'Yangmingism', had a profound impact on China and East Asia.

description.zh-cn: 王守仁之父，成化十七年状元，官至南京吏部尚书。因受刘瑾排挤而官途受挫。
description.en: Father of Wang Shouren, he was the top scholar in the 1481 imperial examination and served as the Minister of Personnel in Nanjing. His career was hindered by the eunuch Liu Jin.

description.zh-cn: 明朝正德年间的专权宦官，因其擅政，曾对王守仁施以廷杖并将其贬谪。
description.en: A powerful eunuch during the Zhengde era of the Ming Dynasty who held immense power. He ordered Wang Shouren to be beaten at court and exiled him.

description.zh-cn: 明朝御史，因被刘瑾逮捕，王守仁上疏营救而受牵连。
description.en: A Censor of the Ming Dynasty. Wang Shouren was implicated after submitting a memorial to rescue him following his arrest by Liu Jin.

description.zh-cn: 王守仁在被贬谪至贵州龙场期间，对《大学》的中心思想产生顿悟，认识到“圣人之道，吾性自足”，为其“心学”理论体系奠定了核心基础。
description.en: During his exile in Longchang, Guizhou, Wang Shouren had an epiphany about the central idea of the 'Great Learning', realizing that 'the way of the sage is complete within my own nature.' This event laid the core foundation for his School of Mind philosophical system.

description.zh-cn: 由王守仁集大成的儒家哲学思想流派，强调“心即理”、“知行合一”和“致良知”。
description.en: A school of Neo-Confucian philosophy developed by Wang Shouren, emphasizing concepts like 'the mind is principle,' 'the unity of knowledge and action,' and 'extending innate knowledge'.

description.zh-cn: 宋代理学家，其“格物致知”学说对王守仁的早期思想产生影响。王守仁后对其理论提出质疑，并发展出自己的心学体系。
description.en: A Song Dynasty Neo-Confucian philosopher whose theory of 'investigating things to extend knowledge' influenced Wang Shouren's early thought. Wang later questioned this theory and developed his own School of Mind.

description.zh-cn: 明朝正德十四年，宁王朱宸濠在南昌发动的叛乱，后被王守仁迅速平定。
description.en: A rebellion launched in 1519 by Zhu Chenhao, the Prince of Ning, in Nanchang during the Zhengde era of the Ming Dynasty. It was swiftly suppressed by Wang Shouren.

description.zh-cn: 明朝宗室，封宁王。正德十四年发动叛乱，史称“宁王之乱”，被王守仁击败并俘获。
description.en: A member of the Ming imperial clan, enfeoffed as the Prince of Ning. He launched a rebellion in 1519, known as the 'Prince of Ning Rebellion', but was defeated and captured by Wang Shouren.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第十位皇帝，年号正德。在宁王之乱被平定后，他以“威武大将军朱寿”的名义南下，希望亲自俘虏宁王。
description.en: The 10th emperor of the Ming Dynasty, with the era name Zhengde. After the Prince of Ning Rebellion was suppressed, he went south under the alias 'Grand General Zhu Shou', hoping to personally capture the prince.

description.zh-cn: 时任吉安知府，作为王守仁的部将，在平定宁王之乱的关键战斗中，通过严明军纪稳定了战线。
description.en: Serving as the Prefect of Ji'an, he was a subordinate commander under Wang Shouren. During a key battle in suppressing the Prince of Ning Rebellion, he stabilized the frontline by enforcing strict military discipline.

description.zh-cn: 发生于明代嘉靖年间，广西地区的瑶族和僮族民变。王守仁被任命为两广总督前往平定。
description.en: An uprising by the Yao and Zhuang peoples in the Guangxi region during the Jiajing era of the Ming Dynasty. Wang Shouren was appointed as the Viceroy of Liangguang to suppress it.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第十一位皇帝，年号嘉靖。他因王守仁平定宁王之乱的功绩，特诏封其为新建伯，并任命其总督两广军务。
description.en: The 11th emperor of the Ming Dynasty, with the era name Jiajing. He ennobled Wang Shouren as Earl of Xinjian for his merit in suppressing the Prince of Ning Rebellion and later appointed him as Viceroy of Liangguang.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第十二位皇帝，年号隆庆。他在位期间追赠王守仁为新建侯。
description.en: The 12th emperor of the Ming Dynasty, with the era name Longqing. During his reign, he posthumously promoted Wang Shouren to the rank of Marquis of Xinjian.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代政治人物，王阳明学说的信奉者。他在台湾将原名“草山”的山脉改名为“阳明山”以纪念王阳明。
description.en: A modern Chinese political figure and an admirer of Wang Yangming's philosophy. In Taiwan, he renamed 'Caoshan' (Grass Mountain) to 'Yangmingshan' in honor of Wang Yangming.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台北市的一座山脉，原名草山。蒋介石为了纪念王阳明而将其更名。
description.en: A mountain range in Taipei, Taiwan, originally named Caoshan. It was renamed by Chiang Kai-shek in honor of Wang Yangming.

description.zh-cn: 南宋哲学家，心学的开创者之一。其“心即理”的思想为王守仁所继承和发展。
description.en: A philosopher of the Southern Song Dynasty and one of the founders of the School of Mind. His idea of 'the mind is principle' was inherited and developed by Wang Shouren.

description.zh-cn: 明朝兵部尚书，赏识王守仁的才能，于正德十一年举荐其为都察院左佥都御史，巡抚南赣。
description.en: Minister of War of the Ming Dynasty. Appreciating Wang Shouren's talent, he recommended him in 1516 for the position of Left Vice Censor-in-Chief to serve as the governor of Southern Jiangxi.

description.zh-cn: 明朝学者，曾向年轻的王守仁讲授“格物致知”之学，对王守仁的早期思想有所启发。
description.en: A Ming Dynasty scholar who taught the young Wang Shouren about the 'investigation of things to extend knowledge,' inspiring his early philosophical inquiries.

description.zh-cn: 王守仁的弟弟。
description.en: Younger brother of Wang Shouren.

description.zh-cn: 王守仁的儿子。
description.en: Son of Wang Shouren.

description.zh-cn: 王守仁的儿子。
description.en: Son of Wang Shouren.

description.zh-cn: 王守仁的岳父。
description.en: Father-in-law of Wang Shouren.

description.zh-cn: 王阳明的语录和论学书信的集子，是其最重要的哲学著作之一，集中体现了阳明心学的主要思想。
description.en: A collection of Wang Yangming's sayings and letters on philosophy, it is one of his most important philosophical works and embodies the main ideas of Yangmingism.

description.zh-cn: 王阳明的主要哲学论著，系统阐述了他以“万物一体”为核心的世界观。
description.en: A major philosophical treatise by Wang Yangming, systematically expounding his worldview centered on the 'unity of all things'.

description.zh-cn: 阳明心学的核心概念之一，主张认知与实践是统一的，不行不算真知。
description.en: A core concept of Yangmingism, advocating that knowledge and action are unified, and action is the necessary completion of knowledge.

description.zh-cn: 王华为诸养和的女婿王守仁的父亲，两人为亲家关系。
description.en: Wang Hua is the father of Zhuyanghe's son-in-law Wang Shouren, making them in-laws.

description.zh-cn: 因王守仁上疏论救被逮捕的御史戴铣等人，刘瑾大怒，对其施以廷杖四十，并将其谪贬至贵州龙场任驿丞。
description.en: After Wang Shouren submitted a memorial to rescue the arrested censor Dai Xian and others, Liu Jin became furious, had him beaten 40 times with a rod at court, and exiled him to Longchang, Guizhou, to serve as a minor station chief.

description.zh-cn: 擅政期间，逮捕了南京给事中御史戴铣等二十余人。
description.en: During his period of dominating the court, he arrested over twenty officials, including the supervising secretary and censor Dai Xian from Nanjing.

description.zh-cn: 上疏论救被刘瑾逮捕的戴铣等人，但因此触怒刘瑾而自身遭难。
description.en: He submitted a memorial to rescue Dai Xian and others who were arrested by Liu Jin, but this angered Liu Jin and led to his own persecution.

description.zh-cn: 因王守仁得罪刘瑾，王华被牵连，外调南京吏部尚书，后又遭罢免。
description.en: Because Wang Shouren offended Liu Jin, Wang Hua was implicated, transferred to be the Minister of Personnel in Nanjing, and was later dismissed from office.

description.zh-cn: 龙场悟道是王守仁思想发展的转折点，使其形成了“心即理”和“知行合一”等核心哲学思想。
description.en: The Longchang Enlightenment was a turning point in Wang Shouren's intellectual development, leading him to formulate core philosophical ideas such as 'the mind is principle' and 'the unity of knowledge and action'.

description.zh-cn: 龙场悟道事件标志着王阳明心学思想体系的正式形成。
description.en: The Longchang Enlightenment event marks the formal establishment of Wang Yangming's School of Mind philosophical system.

description.zh-cn: 王守仁早年曾信奉并实践朱熹的“格物致知”学说，但“格竹”失败的经历促使他对程朱理学产生怀疑，并最终创立了与朱熹思想分歧的阳明心学。
description.en: In his early years, Wang Shouren believed in and practiced Zhu Xi's doctrine of 'investigating things to extend knowledge.' However, the experience of failing to 'investigate bamboo' led him to doubt the Cheng-Zhu school of Neo-Confucianism, eventually creating his own School of Mind, which diverged from Zhu Xi's ideas.

description.zh-cn: 王守仁继承并发展了陆九渊“心即是理”的思想，成为陆王心学的集大成者。
description.en: Wang Shouren inherited and developed Lu Jiuyuan's idea of 'the mind is principle,' becoming the great synthesizer of the Lu-Wang School of Mind.

description.zh-cn: 以南昌为基地发动叛乱，意图推翻明武宗。
description.en: He launched a rebellion based in Nanchang, intending to overthrow Emperor Wuzong of Ming.

description.zh-cn: 调集军队，仅用三十五天便平定了叛乱，并擒获朱宸濠。
description.en: He mobilized troops and suppressed the rebellion in just thirty-five days, capturing Zhu Chenhao.

description.zh-cn: 在鄱阳湖地区设计击败并生擒了朱宸濠。
description.en: He devised a strategy to defeat and capture Zhu Chenhao alive in the Poyang Lake region.

description.zh-cn: 在平定宁王之乱的战役中，作为王守仁的部将参战。
description.en: Participated as a subordinate commander under Wang Shouren in the campaign to suppress the Prince of Ning Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 受命总督两广军务，成功平定了广西地区的瑶族和僮族民变。
description.en: Appointed as Viceroy of Liangguang, he successfully suppressed the uprisings of the Yao and Zhuang peoples in the Guangxi region.

description.zh-cn: 因王守仁平定宁王之乱的功绩，特诏封其为新建伯，并授南京兵部尚书。后又于1527年任命其总督两广军务。
description.en: In recognition of Wang Shouren's merit in suppressing the Prince of Ning Rebellion, he specially edicted his ennoblement as Earl of Xinjian and appointed him Minister of War in Nanjing. Later, in 1527, he appointed him Viceroy of Liangguang.

description.zh-cn: 隆庆年间，追赠王守仁为新建侯。
description.en: During the Longqing era, he posthumously promoted Wang Shouren to the rank of Marquis of Xinjian.

description.zh-cn: 兵部尚书王琼赏识王守仁的才华，举荐其为都察院左佥都御史，巡抚南赣。
description.en: Minister of War Wang Qiong, appreciating Wang Shouren's talent, recommended him for the position of Left Vice Censor-in-Chief to serve as the governor of Southern Jiangxi.

description.zh-cn: 王守仁十八岁时拜谒娄谅，娄谅向他讲授“格物致知”之学，对王守仁的早期思想探索产生了重要影响。
description.en: At the age of eighteen, Wang Shouren visited Lou Liang, who taught him about the 'investigation of things to extend knowledge,' which had a significant impact on his early philosophical explorations.

description.zh-cn: 蒋介石是王阳明学说的信徒，其思想和行为深受阳明学影响。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek was a follower of Wang Yangming's doctrines, and his thoughts and actions were deeply influenced by Yangmingism.

description.zh-cn: 为纪念王阳明，将原名“草山”的山脉改名为“阳明山”。
description.en: To commemorate Wang Yangming, he renamed the mountain range originally known as 'Caoshan' to 'Yangmingshan'.

description.zh-cn: 《传习录》是王守仁的语录和书信集，由其门人辑录而成，是其核心思想的体现。
description.en: The 'Instructions for Practical Living' is a collection of Wang Shouren's sayings and letters, compiled by his disciples, embodying his core philosophical thoughts.

description.zh-cn: 王守仁撰写了《大学问》，是他重要的哲学论著。
description.en: Wang Shouren authored the 'Inquiry on the Great Learning,' one of his significant philosophical works.

description.zh-cn: 王守仁提出了“知行合一”的哲学概念，是阳明学的核心思想之一。
description.en: Wang Shouren proposed the philosophical concept of the 'unity of knowledge and action,' which is one of the core ideas of Yangmingism.
